QuestData.Title: Slagworks: Heart of the Mountain
QuestData.Description: Blackrock warriors use weapons forged in cursed fire by the breath of a creature o' pure flame: The Heart o' the Mountain. Let's disarm 'em, $gboy:lass;! Destroy that infernal creature, and the Blackrock won't have enough heat to fuel their Blast Furnace.$b$bTravel to Blackrock Foundry and defeat the Heart o' the Mountain.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat the Heart of the Mountain at the Blast Furnace in Blackrock Foundry.
